channel.title: Hamachi!
channel.description:
:mad: :mad:OK!!!!!!!!! my hamachi wont evan work i dont know why i evan try to turn off my windows firewall....i dont think i have any other firewall........it says all its "cute" lil things like "connected" "loging in..." "probing" then it goes back to "connected" then it stays there for about 2 mins and says this::[code]Failed to configure Hamachi network adapter.
Configuration problem is most likely caused by you firewalling software blocking DHCP traffic on Hamachi adapter. please make sure that UDP traffic from local prot 68 to port 67 at 5.0.0.1 is allowed. Alternativly you can try to completely disabling the firewall on hamachi adapter
If neither of the above helps or you dont understand this message, visit our Support Forums, report the problem and you will get help.
Would you like for Hamachi to keep trying to configure the adapter while u adjust you firewall settings ?[/code]
What does that mean!?!?!??! ive try :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :mad: :mad: :mad: to adjust my firewall settings it was working just fine till i downloaded jdk 6......so comon im lost somone help!!!! :mad: :rolleyes: :cool: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Hamachi!
item.dc:creator: @legend33 legend33
item.description:
@legend33 wrote:

:mad: :mad:OK!!! my hamachi wont evan work i dont know why i evan try to turn off my windows firewall…i dont think i have any other firewall…it says all its “cute” lil things like “connected” “loging in…”
“probing” then it goes back to “connected” then it stays there for about 2 mins and says this::[code]Failed to configure Hamachi network adapter.

Configuration problem is most likely caused by you firewalling software blocking DHCP traffic on Hamachi adapter. please make sure that UDP traffic from local prot 68 to port 67 at 5.0.0.1 is allowed. Alternativly you can try to completely disabling the firewall on hamachi adapter

If neither of the above helps or you dont understand this message, visit our Support Forums, report the problem and you will get help.

Would you like for Hamachi to keep trying to configure the adapter while u adjust you firewall settings ?[/code]

What does that mean!!! ive try :mad: :mad: :mad: to adjust my firewall settings it was working just fine till i downloaded jdk 6…so comon im lost somone help!!! :mad: :rolleyes:

Read full topic
